scripts.postinstall: npm run clone:all && npm run npminstall:all && npm run config:all
scripts.clone:all: concurrently "npm run clone:getItem" "npm run clone:getItems" "npm run clone:createItem" "npm run clone:updateItem" "npm run clone:deleteItem" "npm run clone:data" "npm run clone:api" "npm run clone:ui"
scripts.npminstall:all: concurrently "npm run npminstall:getItem" "npm run npminstall:getItems" "npm run npminstall:createItem" "npm run npminstall:updateItem" "npm run npminstall:deleteItem" "npm run npminstall:data" "npm run npminstall:api" "npm run npminstall:ui"
scripts.config:all: concurrently "npm run config:getItem" "npm run config:getItems" "npm run config:createItem" "npm run config:updateItem" "npm run config:deleteItem" "npm run config:api"
scripts.config:getItem: echo DB_STORAGE=../sandbox.db >> sandbox-getItem/.env && echo DB_DIALECT=sqlite >> sandbox-getItem/.env&& echo DB_NAME=sandbox >> sandbox-getItem/.env&& echo PORT=8090 >> sandbox-getItem/.env
scripts.config:getItems: echo DB_STORAGE=../sandbox.db >> sandbox-getItems/.env && echo DB_DIALECT=sqlite >> sandbox-getItems/.env&& echo DB_NAME=sandbox >> sandbox-getItems/.env&& echo PORT=8091 >> sandbox-getItems/.env
scripts.config:createItem: echo DB_STORAGE=../sandbox.db >> sandbox-createItem/.env && echo DB_DIALECT=sqlite >> sandbox-createItem/.env&& echo DB_NAME=sandbox >> sandbox-createItem/.env&& echo PORT=8092 >> sandbox-createItem/.env
scripts.config:updateItem: echo DB_STORAGE=../sandbox.db >> sandbox-updateItem/.env && echo DB_DIALECT=sqlite >> sandbox-updateItem/.env&& echo DB_NAME=sandbox >> sandbox-updateItem/.env&& echo PORT=8093 >> sandbox-updateItem/.env
scripts.config:deleteItem: echo DB_STORAGE=../sandbox.db >> sandbox-deleteItem/.env && echo DB_DIALECT=sqlite >> sandbox-deleteItem/.env&& echo DB_NAME=sandbox >> sandbox-deleteItem/.env&& echo PORT=8094 >> sandbox-deleteItem/.env
scripts.config:api: echo PORT=8081 >> sandbox-api/.env && echo GETITEM_PORT=8090 >> sandbox-api/.env && echo GETITEM_HOST=localhost >> sandbox-api/.env&& echo GETITEMS_PORT=8091 >> sandbox-api/.env && echo GETITEMS_HOST=localhost >> sandbox-api/.env&& echo CREATEITEM_PORT=8092 >> sandbox-api/.env && echo CREATEITEM_HOST=localhost >> sandbox-api/.env&& echo UPDATEITEM_PORT=8093 >> sandbox-api/.env && echo UPDATEITEM_HOST=localhost >> sandbox-api/.env&& echo DELETEITEM_PORT=8094 >> sandbox-api/.env && echo DELETEITEM_HOST=localhost >> sandbox-api/.env
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:getItem" "npm run start:getItems" "npm run start:createItem" "npm run start:updateItem" "npm run start:deleteItem" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:getItem:dev" "npm run start:getItems:dev" "npm run start:createItem:dev" "npm run start:updateItem:dev" "npm run start:deleteItem:dev" "npm run start:api:dev" "npm run start:ui:dev"
